scripts.build: echo '--- [DEBUG] 1. Listing root ---' && ls -laR && echo '--- [DEBUG] 2. Entering /web and installing ---' && cd web && yarn install --frozen-lockfile --production=false && echo '--- [DEBUG] 3. Building React app ---' && yarn build && echo '--- [DEBUG] 4. Listing /web after build ---' && ls -laR && echo '--- [DEBUG] 5. Moving web/build to /public ---' && mv build ../public && echo '--- [DEBUG] 6. Returning to root and listing after move ---' && cd .. && ls -laR && echo '--- [DEBUG] 7. Build finished ---'
